searchSql.baseSql:
select CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID, sum(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) LOSE_NUM_WEEK,--流失单数
sum(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) REC_NUM_WEEK,--收单数
sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) TOTAL_NUM_WEEK,--总单数 --NUM1/NUM2--单数流失率 --12月流失率 sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) LOSE_AMOUNT_WEEK,--流失金额
sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then MORT_COM_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) REC_AMOUNT_WEEK,--收单金额
sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) TOTAL_AMOUNT_WEEK,--总金额
--AMOUNT1/AMOUNT3--金额流失率
sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #endWeekDay#/100-1 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100-1 then LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) LOSE_AMOUNT_LAST_MONTH,--流失金额
sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #endWeekDay#/100-1 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100-1 then LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) TOTAL_AMOUNT_LAST_MONTH,--总金额
--AMOUNT11/AMOUNT31 --11月流失率
sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) LOSE_AMOUNT_MONTH,--流失金额
sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) TOTAL_AMOUNT_MONTH--总金额
--AMOUNT12/AMOUNT32 --本月累计 from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO where MORT_TYPE in ('30016001','30016002') and TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1

select CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID, sum(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) REC_NUM_WEEK,--收单案件总量
sum(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null then 1 else 0 end) EVA_NUM_WEEK,--有评估费单数
--NUM2/NUM1--评估转化率
sum(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then 1 else 0 end) REC_NUM_MONTH,--收单案件总量
sum(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 and EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null then 1 else 0 end) EVA_NUM_MONTH,--有评估费单数 --NUM11/NUM21--本月累计 sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then MORT_COM_AMOUNT*0.0001 else 0 end,0)) EVA_AMOUNT_WEEK,--评估费应收
sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then EVA_EVAL_FEE else 0 end,0)) EVA_ACT_AMOUNT_WEEK,--评估费实收
--AMOUNT2/AMOUNT1--收益率 sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then MORT_COM_AMOUNT*0.0001 else 0 end,0)) EVA_AMOUNT_MONTH,--评估费应收 sum(isnull(case when CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then EVA_EVAL_FEE else 0 end,0)) EVA_ACT_AMOUNT_MONTH--评估费实收 --AMOUNT21/AMOUNT11--本月累计 from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO where MORT_TYPE in ('30016001','30016002') and TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1 and CASE_REC_STATUS = 0

select CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID, sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) GUOHU_NUM_WEEK,--本周 过户单数
sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and ELOAN_KA is not null then 1 else 0 end) KA_APP_NUM_WEEK,--本周 卡申请单数
--NUM2/NUM1--本周 单数转化率
sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then 1 else 0 end) GUOHU_NUM_MONTH,--本月 过户单数 sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 and ELOAN_KA is not null then 1 else 0 end) KA_APP_NUM_MONTH,--本月 卡申请单数 --NUM21/NUM11--本月 单数转化率 sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 and ELOAN_KA is not null and ELOAN_KA_AMOUNT is not null then 1 else 0 end) KA_NUM_MONTH--本月 刷卡单数 --NUM31/NUM11--本月 刷卡率 --此处使用快速查询 ELOAN_KA_APP_NUM_MONTH--本月 E+卡申请总量 from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO where TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1

select CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID, sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) GUOHU_NUM_WEEK,--本周 E+过户单数
sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then CASE_CON_PRICE else 0 end,0)) HOUSE_PRICE_WEEK,--本周 房屋价格
sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and ELOAN_PRO is not null then 1 else 0 end) PRO_APP_NUM_WEEK,--本周 E+申请单数
sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and ELOAN_PRO is not null then ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) PRO_APP_AMOUNT_WEEK,--本周 E+申请金额
--AMOUNT2/AMOUNT1--本周 金额转化率
sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #endWeekDay# and cast(convert(varchar(8) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) GUOHU_NUM_WEEK,--本周 过户单数
sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 then CASE_CON_PRICE else 0 end,0)) HOUSE_PRICE_MONTH,--本月 房屋价格 sum(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 and ELOAN_PRO is not null then 1 else 0 end) PRO_APP_NUM_MONTH,--本月 E+申请单数 sum(isnull(case when BELONG_WEEK_START_DAY/100 = #startWeekDay#/100 and cast(convert(varchar(6) , TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) = #endWeekDay#/100 and ELOAN_PRO is not null then ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT else 0 end,0)) PRO_APP_AMOUNT_MONTH--本月 E+申请金额 --AMOUNT21/AMOUNT11--本月 金额转化率 --此处使用快速查询 ELOAN_PRO_APP_NUM_MONTH--本月 E+申请总量 from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO where TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1
